header.subtitle: A calendar of UHC matches from {{ reddit }}.

appcache.error: Error caching app on device, your browser may not support it.

clockbar.resyncTooltip: Click this to re-sync time with the server
clockbar.timezoneTooltip: Click to go to settings page to edit
clockbar.wrongTimezone: You are not using the detected timezone '{{ guessedTimeZone }}' Click this icon to switch to it.
clockbar.unsynced: Time has not been synced yet
clockbar.unsyncedIconTooltip: The time failed to sync with the server, time may be wrong

enable.message: Click me to enable Desktop notifications
enable.info: Enable to get notifications when games are starting soon

denied.info: To renable notifications in Chrome click on the page icon to the left of the URL and change the value for 'Notifications'. Other browsers require google-fu
denied.message: Desktop alerts are blocked, no notifications can be made.

unsupported.message: Desktop alerts are not supported by your browser, no notifications will be made.

tooltips.startTime: Time display is game start time, not whitelist off
tooltips.posted: Time posted in advance of game opening

copy.failed: Failed to copy to clipboard, please copy manually

uniqueItems.alreadyInArray: This item is already in the list

about.summary: This website is a collection of upcoming UltraHardcore games hosted by users on {{ link }}
about.title: About

generator.notice: Make sure to read the submission rules for the subreddit you are posting to BEFORE using this tool. Rules for the main /r/uhcmatches subreddit can be found {{ rules }}

title.info: The title to show on the list, do NOT include the time/scenarios e.t.c, that can be provided below

opens.info: Time game will open (in your selected timezone)

teams.CHOSEN: Players form teams before the match
teams.CAPTAINS: Selected team leaders pick their teammates.
teams.PICKED: Players take turns joining a team.
teams.AUCTION: Selected team leaders buy their teammates.

scenarios.contained: This scenario is already in your list

tags.contained: This tag is already in your list

template.default: You cannot use the default template to post to Reddit. Use the Template Editor below to create your own/copy the default and use that one instead.

generator.overhost: Be careful! There is already a game at this time in the same region on your calendar

post404.title: 404 - Not Found
post404.header: No post with the id {{ id }} was found
post404.reload: Will automatically attemtpt to load the post details again in {{ seconds }} seconds

filters.tab: Filter Posts - Showing {{ showing }} of {{ all }}

addSub.message: Do you want to add the subreddit '/r/{{ subreddit }}' to your settings? You can remove it later by visiting the 'Settings' page

list.failedSubs: Failed to load matches from the chosen subreddit/s: {{ subs }}

timezone.info: Timezone for all times/dates on the website:

timeFormat.info: Time format to for the website:

subreddits.none: You do not have any subreddits set up, you will not see any posts
subreddits.contained: This subreddit is already in your list

notifications.info: When to send notifications before a game opens:

favourites-author.contained: This username is already in your favourites

blocked-author.contained: This username is already in your blocked list

favourites-tag.contained: This tag is already in your favourites

blocked-tag.contained: This tag is already in your blocked list

templates.noedit: You cannot edit the default template.
templates.name: Template Name

help.opensUTC: When the match opens in the format MMM DD HH:mm Z
help.title: The title of the post
help.region: The short code of the region
help.teams: The generated team type. e.g. Mystery To4
help.surround: Surround the variable with curly brackets

autoTimezone.message: The calendar has automatically set your timezone to {{ timezone }}. This will only happen once, go to the settings page if you want to change it.
